001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
009
010/**
011 * A training regime that performs <strong>online training</strong>.
012 * <p>
013 * In online training (also known as stochastic training), the model
014 * is updated after processing each individual sample, rather than
015 * waiting for a full batch or mini-batch. This can lead to faster
016 * convergence in some cases, but updates are noisier compared to
017 * batch or mini-batch regimes.
018 * </p>
019 *
020 * <h2>Behavior</h2>
021 * <ul>
022 *   <li>The training set is traversed sequentially.</li>
023 *   <li>For each sample, a single-sample subset is created and passed
024 *       to the optimizer.</li>
025 *   <li>The optimizer performs an update immediately after each sample.</li>
026 * </ul>
027 *
028 * <h2>Use cases</h2>
029 * <p>
030 * Online regimes are useful for streaming data, very large datasets
031 * that cannot fit in memory, or when responsiveness to new data
032 * is important.
033 * </p>
034 *
035 * @see Regime
036 * @see BatchRegime
037 * @see MiniBatchRegime
038 */
039@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
040public final class OnlineRegime implements Regime {
041
042    /**
043     * Trains the given estimation function in an online manner by iterating
044     * over each sample in the dataset and invoking the optimizer immediately
045     * for each one.
046     *
047     * @param estimationFunction the model or function to train
048     * @param trainingSet        the dataset containing training samples
049     * @param objective          the objective/loss function
050     * @param optimizer          the optimizer used to update parameters
051     * @param <E>                the type of estimation function
052     */
053    @Override
054    public <E extends EstimationFunction<Float>> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<Float> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E, Float> optimizer) {
055        for (int i = 0; i < trainingSet.size(); i++) {
056            optimizer.optimize(estimationFunction, trainingSet.subset(i, i + 1), objective);
057        }
058    }
059
060}
